question: Which among the following Buddhist scripture deals in the teachings of Buddhism?
explanation: The Sutta-pitaka (or basket of suttas) contains the essence of the Gautma Buddhaâ€™s teaching regarding the Dhamma. It contains more than 10,000 suttas (or teachings) attributed to the Buddha or his close disciples. It is the second of three sections of the Tripitaka, the earliest Buddhist scripture. The Sutta Pitaka is made of five nikayas ( or collections) of suttas viz. Digha Nikaya, Majjhima Nikaya, Samyutta Nikaya, Anguttara Nikaya, Khuddaka Nikaya.
